arts.ttl: Espanyol-Athletic marred by Sannadi racist abuse
arts.sum: Athletic Club forward Iñaki Williams has said teammate Maroan Sannadi was racially abused by home supporters during his side's 1-1 draw away at Espanyol in LaLiga on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Barcelona expected to forego Nico Williams as 2025 transfer option
arts.sum: Barcelona are keen to make a big-name attacking signing this summer, and a shortlist of targets has already been drawn up by sporting director Deco. Luis Diaz, Rafael Leao and Alexander Isak are among the players being considered, but one player that does not feature heavily in the thoughts of those at Can Barca is […] The post Barcelona expected to forego Nico Williams as 2025 transfer option appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Luis Diaz the key to Arsenal signing Nico Williams

arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest confirmed transfer news and speculation from across the footballing world.

arts.ttl: Arsenal and Liverpool target Nico Williams has a preference if he leaves Athletic Club
arts.sum: Nico Williams remains one of the most coveted players in European football, with both Arsenal and Liverpool having recently made contact regarding a move. Chelsea are also said to have an interest in the wide man, though Mikel Arteta would love to land Williams for the Gunners. Nico Williams has indicated a preference of who […] The post Arsenal and Liverpool target Nico Williams has a preference if he leaves Athletic Club appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Barcelona-linked Nico Williams 'transfer preference revealed' after Arsenal, Liverpool 'contact'
arts.sum: Arsenal and Liverpool 'make contact' with Nico Williams' camp to discuss a summer move, but the Athletic Bilbao forward would allegedly choose to join Barcelona over any other club.

arts.ttl: Arsenal news: Nico Williams makes shock transfer U-TURN amid Barcelona interest
arts.sum: Athletic Club winger Nico Williams has reportedly decided to join Barcelona this summer, despite significant interest from Arsenal . Real Sociedad star Martin Zubimendi is also expected to join the Emirates Stadium outfit this summer and the presence of several Spain internationals could help persuade Williams to join the Gunners.
